'Drive' is a 1998 Cult Action film starring Mark Dacascos, Kadeem Hardison,
Tracey Walter, John Pyper-Ferguson, Brittany Murphy, and Masaya Kato. The film
was directed by Steve Wang with stunt work/fight choreography done by Koichi
Sakamoto. Like most of Wang's films at the time, Drive went straight-to-video
but received a Cult following afterwards.
